sql-select.name: GetTablesWithForeignKeyColumnTypeMismatch
ForeignKey with the mismatched type columns
sql-select.description: Find all tables with foreign key, where the reference columns have the diffent types.
sql-select.sql-select-text:
SET NOCOUNT ON; SET DEADLOCK_PRIORITY LOW;
SELECT tSFKObj.[name] AS [ForeignKeyName] ,tSUSource.[name] AS [SourceTableSchema] ,tSOSource.[name] AS [SourceTableName] ,tFKSourceSCol.[name] AS [SourceTableColumnName] ,tFKSourceSColStype.[name] AS [SourceTableColumnTypeName] ,tFKSourceSCol.[length] AS [SourceTableColumnLength] ,tFKSourceSCol.[xprec] AS [SourceTableColumnPrecision] ,tSUDest.[name] AS [DestTableSchema] ,tSODest.[name] AS [DestTableName] ,tFKDestSCol.[name] AS [DestTableColumnName] ,tFKDestSColSType.[name] AS [DestTableColumnTypeName] ,tFKDestSCol.[length] AS [DestTableColumnLength] ,tFKDestSCol.[xprec] AS [DestTableColumnPrecision] FROM [dbo].[sysforeignkeys] tSFK INNER JOIN [dbo].[sysobjects] tSFKObj ON tSFKObj.[id] = tSFK.[constid] INNER JOIN [dbo].[sysobjects] tSOSource ON tSOSource.[id] = tSFK.[fkeyid] INNER JOIN [dbo].[sysusers] tSUSource ON tSUSource.[uid] = tSOSource.[uid] INNER JOIN [dbo].[syscolumns] tFKSourceSCol ON tFKSourceSCol.[id] = tSOSource.[id] AND tFKSourceSCol.[colid] = tSFK.[fkey] INNER JOIN [dbo].[systypes] tFKSourceSColStype ON tFKSourceSColStype.[xusertype] = tFKSourceSCol.[xusertype] INNER JOIN [dbo].[sysobjects] tSODest ON tSODest.[id] = tSFK.[rkeyid] INNER JOIN [dbo].[sysusers] tSUDest ON tSUDest.[uid] = tSODest.[uid] INNER JOIN [dbo].[syscolumns] tFKDestSCol ON tFKDestSCol.[id] = tSODest.[id] AND tFKDestSCol.[colid] = tSFK.[rkey] INNER JOIN [dbo].[systypes] tFKDestSColSType ON tFKDestSColSType.[xusertype] = tFKDestSCol.[xusertype] WHERE tFKDestSColSType.[name] != tFKSourceSColStype.[name] OR ( tFKDestSColSType.[name] = tFKSourceSColStype.[name] AND tFKDestSCol.[length] != tFKSourceSCol.[length] ) OR ( tFKDestSColSType.[name] = tFKSourceSColStype.[name] AND tFKDestSCol.[length] = tFKSourceSCol.[length] AND tFKDestSCol.[xprec] != tFKSourceSCol.[xprec] ) ORDER BY tSFKObj.[name] ,tSUSource.[name] ,tSOSource.[name] ,tFKSourceSCol.[name];

SET NOCOUNT ON; SET DEADLOCK_PRIORITY LOW;
SELECT tSFK.[name] AS [ForeignKeyName] ,tSSSource.[name] AS [SourceTableSchema] ,tSOSource.[name] AS [SourceTableName] ,tFKSourceSCol.[name] AS [SourceTableColumnName] ,tFKSourceSColStype.[name] AS [SourceTableColumnTypeName] ,tFKSourceSCol.[max_length] AS [SourceTableColumnLength] ,tFKSourceSCol.[precision] AS [SourceTableColumnPrecision] ,tSSDest.[name] AS [DestTableSchema] ,tSODest.[name] AS [DestTableName] ,tFKDestSCol.[name] AS [DestTableColumnName] ,tFKDestSColSType.[name] AS [DestTableColumnTypeName] ,tFKDestSCol.[max_length] AS [DestTableColumnLength] ,tFKDestSCol.[precision] AS [DestTableColumnPrecision] FROM [sys].[foreign_keys] tSFK INNER JOIN [sys].[foreign_key_columns] tSFKCols ON tSFKCols.[constraint_object_id] = tSFK.[object_id] AND tSFKCols.[parent_object_id] = tSFK.[parent_object_id] INNER JOIN [sys].[objects] tSOSource ON tSOSource.[object_id] = tSFK.[parent_object_id] INNER JOIN [sys].[schemas] tSSSource ON tSSSource.[schema_id] = tSOSource.[schema_id] INNER JOIN [sys].[columns] tFKSourceSCol ON tFKSourceSCol.[object_id] = tSOSource.[object_id] AND tFKSourceSCol.[column_id] = tSFKCols.[parent_column_id] INNER JOIN [sys].[types] tFKSourceSColStype ON tFKSourceSColStype.[user_type_id] = tFKSourceSCol.[user_type_id] INNER JOIN [sys].[objects] tSODest ON tSODest.[object_id] = tSFK.[referenced_object_id] INNER JOIN [sys].[schemas] tSSDest ON tSSDest.[schema_id] = tSODest.[schema_id] INNER JOIN [sys].[columns] tFKDestSCol ON tFKDestSCol.[object_id] = tSODest.[object_id] AND tFKDestSCol.[column_id] = tSFKCols.[referenced_column_id] INNER JOIN [sys].[types] tFKDestSColStype ON tFKDestSColStype.[user_type_id] = tFKDestSCol.[user_type_id] WHERE tFKDestSColSType.[name] != tFKSourceSColStype.[name] OR ( tFKDestSColSType.[name] = tFKSourceSColStype.[name] AND tFKDestSCol.[max_length] != tFKSourceSCol.[max_length] ) OR ( tFKDestSColSType.[name] = tFKSourceSColStype.[name] AND tFKDestSCol.[max_length] = tFKSourceSCol.[max_length] AND tFKDestSCol.[precision] != tFKSourceSCol.[precision] ) ORDER BY tSFK.[name] ,tSSSource.[name] ,tSOSource.[name] ,tFKSourceSCol.[name];
